description: This course focuses on the practices, ethics and challenges of video journalism in a digital age.
Students learn imaged-based journalism through academic analyses, review of stories reported
by Twin Cities newsrooms, and hands-on production of multiple video broadcast and online
news stories. Students acquire video shooting, editing and interviewing skills relevant to the
workplace today. The course includes two trips to the Twin Cities to visit the studio and Capitol
bureau of KARE 11, the NBC television affiliate in Minneapolis. Offered periodically.
